TunableList.name: filters
TunableList.description: List of filters for the sims to be included in the group.

Tunable.name: optional
Tunable.description: Whether or not this filter is required for the filter to be considered successful.

TunableEnum.name: tag
TunableEnum.description: Tag associated with the filter which allows for specific filters to be associated with specific things, like which job to apply to the Sim with that filter.

Tunable.name: filter
Tunable.description: Sim filter that is used as the leader of the group. All relationships will use this sim as the reference point.

TunableEnum.description: Tag associated with the filter which allows for specific filters to be associated with specific things, like which job to apply to the Sim with that filter.
